about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate about Web3 development and 3D technologies, I graduated from The Hacking Project (Sept 2024 – May 2025 class) and am currently taking Three.js Journey training while working self-taught on Three.js and Blender. Enthusiastic about contributing to web decentralization, I combine front-end rigor and back-end curiosity to bring immersive and performant interfaces to life.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover my latest creations in Web3 and full-stack development

coinTribe.title: CoinTribe - Crypto Voting Project
coinTribe.description: Community platform for cryptocurrency enthusiasts, combining real-time market analysis, sentiment voting, and dynamic discussions. Interactive dashboard with CoinGecko and TradingView data, gamification system, and admin panel.

intuition.title: Intuition Chrome Extension
intuition.description: Web3 extension that brings decentralized trust directly to your browser. Transforms your browsing experience into a social layer of insights, where you can see who in your trust network recommends a page, read relevant annotations, avoid phishing attempts, and contribute contextual knowledge for others.
intuition.problemSolved: The modern web is full of noise, misinformation, and security threats — and users have limited tools to assess credibility or reliability in real-time. Intuition extension solves this by bringing decentralized, people-powered trust directly to your browser. It's like Community Notes for the entire Internet — but decentralized and composable.

baseBatch.name: Base Batch Europe
baseBatch.description: Global Base builders program to create the next generation of onchain applications. Prizes up to 10.5 ETH and incubator placement.
